rukus.text: Allahu Yabda'u Al-Khalqa Thumma Yu`iduhu Thumma 'Ilayhi Turja`una
Wa Yawma Taqumu As-Sa`atu Yublisu Al-Mujrimuna
Wa Lam Yakun Lahum Min Shuraka'ihim Shufa`a'u Wa Kanu Bishuraka'ihim Kafirina
Wa Yawma Taqumu As-Sa`atu Yawma'idhin Yatafarraquna
Fa'amma Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Fahum Fi Rawatin Yuhbaruna
Wa 'Amma Al-Ladhina Kafaru Wa Kadhabu Bi'ayatina Wa Liqa'i Al-'Akhirati Fa'ula'ika Fi Al-`Adhabi Muharuna
Fasubhana Allahi Hina Tumsuna Wa Hina Tusbihuna
Wa Lahu Al-Hamdu Fi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Ari Wa `Ashiyaan Wa Hina Tuzhiruna
Yukhriju Al-Hayya Mina Al-Mayyiti Wa Yukhriju Al-Mayyita Mina Al-Hayyi Wa Yuhyi Al-'Ara Ba`da Mawtiha Wa Kadhalika Tukhrajuna
